mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.pickuptime, b.mark FROM recogs a LEFT JOIN batchlog b ON a.batchid = b.batchid WHERE ( ISNULL(b.pickuptime) OR b.pickuptime < NOW() ) AND ( ISNULL(a.`status`) OR a.`status` = 1 OR a.manualresult = 8 ) AND ISNULL(b.batchid)=FALSE ORDER BY seqid LIMIT 0, 1
